au.edu.uow.QuestionLibrary
Interface Question

All Known Implementing Classes:
MultipleChoiceQuestion, TrueAndFalseQuestion
public interface Question

This interface specifies the requirements of implementation classes.
This program is provided for the CSCI213 Assignment.
Note: You should not modify this program but create suitable classes to implement this interface.

Author:
Lei Ye

compareAnswer

boolean compareAnswer(int ans)
This method compares the student's answer to the standard answer.

Parameters:
ans - The student's answer
Returns:
True for the correct answer; false for incorrect answers.
See Also:
getQuestion(), getChoices()
